mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the monthly sections entitled "On the Record", "The Square of the Month", "For the Caller: Behind the Mike", "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), and "Southern California Square Dance Directory". This edition also contains the articles "The Youngsters are Dancin'", "The Teen-Age Picture", "2nd Stampede", "What's Cookin' in Washington", "Round the Outside Ring", "A Problem & An Answer", and "Let's Have a Party".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
